links.title: Tesla's Model 3 Is Now the United States Best Selling Electric Vehicle - Investments Revolution
links.description: It's official: Tesla's new Model 3 is now the best-selling electric vehicle in the U.S. Tesla released its production numbers for the first quarter 2018 on Tuesday. The company delivered 8,180 Model 3s in the first quarter of the year. That compares with 6,468 deliveries for Toyota Motor's Prius Prime plug-in hybrid and 4,375 for General Motors's Chevy Bolt.

links.title: US takes aim at 1,300 Chinese imports
links.description: The US has published a list of about 1,300 products from China it plans to hit with a 25% tariff. The White House says the proposed extra tax on the imports is a response to unfair Chinese practices around intellectual property rights. The wide-ranging list includes items such as medical products, televisions and motorcycles.
